title: By the King, a proclamation forasmuch as it hath pleased Almighty God lately to call unto his infinite mercy the Most High and Mighty Prince, Charles the Second of most blessed memory ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, deceas'd, and by Henry Hills and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Other-title information from first 3 lines of text.
"Given at the court at Whitehall, the sixth day of February, in the first year of His Majesty's reign ... "
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
